body:
Hey I am Xuph but most people call me by my name - Eric
I played this server for 4 years and i enjoy competitive with apollo
im also a builder in badlion and sarefine other than here.
i like to melee pvp and im decent with bow aha

Ask me questions!

reply_to.body: Is Apollo going to win the tourney?
reply_to.body_tagged: Is Apollo going to win the tourney?

replies.body:
Hi panda

Youre a really nice person. i didnt get to talk to you a lot but you seem to be rly nice. i also like your memes and i think ur a funny person as well. hope we get to talk more

As a player i think youre not the best in your team in pvp, but youre still a decent defender and i personally struggle getting into your wool in scrims because you know how to hold off well and your rotations are really fast. good luck in this tourney.
replies.body_tagged:
Hi panda

Youre a really nice person. i didnt get to talk to you a lot but you seem to be rly nice. i also like your memes and i think ur a funny person as well. hope we get to talk more

As a player i think youre not the best in your team in pvp, but youre still a decent defender and i personally struggle getting into your wool in scrims because you know how to hold off well and your rotations are really fast. good luck in this tourney.

reply_to.body: opinion
reply_to.body_tagged: opinion

replies.body:
Hi tazz

Great melee player. dont know about your bow. Can offend really well and i wish you played KFC with spectre because we lacked offence. I really like your playstyle. I think youre a very valuable player for a team to have, and youre also reliable. I hope to get to play with you in the future

As a person, youre two faced. by that i mean youre sometimes so nice to me and youd do that in order for me making you something like an edit or a map but in other cases you can be rude as well
Youre a great friend of mine though and i enjoy talking to you even if you can be annoying sometimes. I wish youd be more active :c
replies.body_tagged:
Hi tazz

Great melee player. dont know about your bow. Can offend really well and i wish you played KFC with spectre because we lacked offence. I really like your playstyle. I think youre a very valuable player for a team to have, and youre also reliable. I hope to get to play with you in the future

As a person, youre two faced. by that i mean youre sometimes so nice to me and youd do that in order for me making you something like an edit or a map but in other cases you can be rude as well
Youre a great friend of mine though and i enjoy talking to you even if you can be annoying sometimes. I wish youd be more active :c

replies.body:
Hey bader

I don't have a player opinion on you since i didnt see you play competitive, but from the few times ive fought you on public youre decent with the sword (?) you should get into competitive

As a person i can tell youre committed to the network and i appreciate you devoting time doing all these spotlights actively and its a responsibility to take. I remember talking to you in ts once or twice and you never used your mic.
Other than that i know that youre one of these people who are really mature for their age and its also something nice to have.

replies.body:
Hey james

You're hella annoying sometimes ngl. You just argue for the sake of arguining at times and your points make literally no sense, but at times you can be really smart and win arguements by this. I like your sarcasm when we used to talk in ts and sad that we don't do anymore, you should be active on ts again. I dont think youre very good in hack detection as a mod too, but that comes with time and experience so its fine

As a player i think youre decent with sword but i guess bow is your better thing since i saw you bow sometimes. Not much else to say, sorry :c

Practice on pot pvp servers, it improves your melee the most

replies.body:
Yes so we can play more 3ggw0r$

One of my oldest friends i made on here. I love you a lot as a person and talking to you is a pleasure. I wish you'd use your mic more like long time ago cause you got a nice voice and nobody cares what accent you have it doesnt matter, trust me
Got huge knowledge with all that PC stuff and internet and especially routers ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
I made lots of memories with you. I love playing whatever with you especially our eggwars games i will never forget. youre a fun person to be around and youre really funny as well. i love you <3

Good sword player, little less good in bow but keep improving your sword until you get really really good. good luck in cacalmarin!

My asthma, im a pretty good football player and i love sports but most of the time i struggle reaching my full skill because of this

Friends stabbing in the back, trust breaking

Process

Dont stop

replies.body:
Hey toms

One of my best spanish friends along with bloodoh. Youre such a smart person when it comes to game tactics and in general and i love seeing you play or think about anything since you always come up with creative and smart solutions. 
I really enjoy talking and memeing with you. Really good defender, nice bow and sword and comms, you also got huge player potential and im happy to see youre on yirang, theyll get the most out of you i hope.

replies.body:
Stop asking im not joining ! XD !

Hi max

Easily one of my best friends on here and minecraft in general. Most of my funny times were with you. Talking to you is literally a blast and we always have fun talking. Youre a really nice and funny person and im happy that we get to talk a lot. i like playing uhc and anything else with you. I miss your skype video calls and room tours lmfao these were great

Great defender too with mad melee and decent bow. you could honestly work on your defenses a bit and your comms too, but i guess its because youre spanish its not very easy to communicate well in an english team.

I love you aaaaaaaa <3
replies.body_tagged:
Stop asking im not joining ! XD !

Hi max

Easily one of my best friends on here and minecraft in general. Most of my funny times were with you. Talking to you is literally a blast and we always have fun talking. Youre a really nice and funny person and im happy that we get to talk a lot. i like playing uhc and anything else with you. I miss your skype video calls and room tours lmfao these were great

Great defender too with mad melee and decent bow. you could honestly work on your defenses a bit and your comms too, but i guess its because youre spanish its not very easy to communicate well in an english team.

I love you aaaaaaaa <3

replies.body:
Hi scaglia

I don't know you that well, but i remember talking to you in whatsapp few times haha
I always thought youre a very nice person and i still do. You really helped the ref team and took the job seriously. I liked it when you made your beaner spotlights aha xd

I never really saw you play so i cant tell about your pvp but you were in EC and other teams which were decent so ill guess youre a good player. Hope we get to know eachother more

I have lots, gamewise id say League vs Bad Company my last monument break in 2 seconds, or either some double caps and crazy objectives i got on some tournies
Fun wise apollo is a great team so we have lots of good moments with eachother but one to remember is our rave session ft. earrape when we all sing in ts.

replies.body:
Hi sevo

I dont recall ever actually speaking to you over voice, just ingame. As a person you honestly annoy me sometimes by the fact you suck up to people you want them to do something. Ngl it feels like youre tryharding to get in apollo constantly and fanboy some us etc. Other than that i saw you being toxic so many times but later on you apologised and became a better person so gj on having the balls to admit and change.           

As a player i think you have great melee but your ping might be a factor since i fought you in avicus only, but lets say your melee probably wouldve been good anyways. Idk about your bow never seen it properly. Potential to become good competitive player


It's open for donator preview only
edit: for now not forever

reply_to.body:
Stop asking im not joining ! XD !

Hi max

Easily one of my best friends on here and minecraft in general. Most of my funny times were with you. Talking to you is literally a blast and we always have fun talking. Youre a really nice and funny person and im happy that we get to talk a lot. i like playing uhc and anything else with you. I miss your skype video calls and room tours lmfao these were great

Great defender too with mad melee and decent bow. you could honestly work on your defenses a bit and your comms too, but i guess its because youre spanish its not very easy to communicate well in an english team.

I love you aaaaaaaa <3

replies.body:
Hi ben

Youre a really nice person. you talk wayyyyy too much all the time you need to calm down a bit, lol
Youre attention seeking as well sometimes but its not too much so i dont really mind tbh
I think youre a good player with potential but if you played in a team youd probably not communicate very well atm, so if youre looking for competitive scene you need to work on your talking
I played public with you few times and we had a lotta fun :)

I feel like i improved player wise i guess you meant

Yes  i will forever love him :(

replies.body:
Hola blaze

Really really active on every timezone. im not trying to invade your life but from my pov  i think you should try to balance your playtime with irl. again i might be wrong so idk, just my opinion
I used to never like you as a player because i thought and kinda still think you abuse your connection and weird kb for your favor, but tbf it still takes skill to be decent with this connection
Youre a rly nice person to talk to. you always say your honest opinion everywhere and i have lots of respect to you more than others on this server
Now that you joined apollo youre doing a decent job but im sure now we will get to talk more and become better friends :)

reply_to.body: opinions
reply_to.body_tagged: opinions

replies.body:
Hey borra

Youre from the middle east habibi so i take you as a bud already haha.
Youre a nice defender and youre always working towards improving. 
Recently my opinion has really changed on you since ive always seen you as a nice person but you seem to become a really toxic guy now idk why but id like to see you like you were beforehand. 
You really overdo your defenses on scrims and imo defenders need to understand a very important thing no matter what team youre playing against so take that tip: prioritize everything you do. make an early defense and you gotta sort out all the stuff that youre doing by priority and make them match the playstyle of the other team. if youre defending right and your team got control of right sky for most of the match you can work on your defense monument but for example if they tunnel alot you should adjust to the game and work more on a pit etc.

Hey borra

Youre from the middle east habibi so i take you as a bud already haha.
Youre a nice defender and youre always working towards improving. 
Recently my opinion has really changed on you since ive always seen you as a nice person but you seem to become a really toxic guy now idk why but id like to see you like you were beforehand. 
You really overdo your defenses on scrims and imo defenders need to understand a very important thing no matter what team youre playing against so take that tip: prioritize everything you do. make an early defense and you gotta sort out all the stuff that youre doing by priority and make them match the playstyle of the other team. if youre defending right and your team got control of right sky for most of the match you can work on your defense monument but for example if they tunnel alot you should adjust to the game and work more on a pit etc.
